page.description: Reports whether a named category within a property grid is open (expanded) or closed.
page.syntax: Open_Status as L = PropertyGrid.IsExpanded( Name as C )

argument.name: Open_Status
argument.decscription: .T. = Category is open (expanded), .F. = Category is closed

argument.name: Name
argument.decscription: The name of a category in a property grid.

page.discussion: The PropertyGrid.IsExpanded() method reports whether a named category within a property grid is open (expanded) or closed. Note : Only the {PROPGRID} command can create the PropertyGrid object.
